ISSUE.TITLE: Can't remove unreachable servers from Outline Manager
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hey y'all :) My Outline Manager is currently in a weird state: - There are 2 unreachable servers (GCP, not Digital Ocean) in the Manager. - Their icons on the left sidebar keep spinning. - At first, clicking each icon shows the usual "Connections" and "Settings" tabs but with null/0/blank metrics. - Clicking the "remove server" menu item from the 3 dot menu doesn't do anything. - Eventually, I see this "Server unreachable" page (screenshot attached). - Clicking the "Remove Server" button doesn't do anything. I got into this state because I was experimenting with starting my own Outline server on GCP. When I restarted the GCE instance, the IP changed, and then this "Server unreachable" issue appeared. I re-ran the install script on the instance, added the new IP to Outline Manager, then again shutdown the server and then had a 2nd unreachable server. Outline manager version: 1.8.0 (1.8.0.4401) Thanks!

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Populate an unreachable server's view with the server id This fixes https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server/issues/888, https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server/issues/886, and https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server/issues/873 which were caused by the missing id keeping us from finding the server to forget.

Populate an unreachable server's view with the server id (#890) This fixes https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server/issues/888, https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server/issues/886, and https://github.com/Jigsaw-Code/outline-server/issues/873 which were caused by the missing id keeping us from finding the server to forget.
